name: Little Brave
description:
'Little Brave' is a charity game project from Laguna college of Art and design in California. 

It has been presented for donation for kids more than 7 years old in hospital with fairy tale book style story telling through 2D/3D mixed side-scrolling plat-former game for mobile and PC.

This is Alpha version that has half of chapter 1 with assets in working on progress.

Beta Version will come out through May~June, so please help us with support!

 www.littlebrave.net

Also, Please take the link below for survey to develop the game in positive way!
